name: Mirakl - Config 2022
description:
Product Designers and

Content Writers: a duo for Product excellence

  • Product Content within the Product Organization @Mirakl
  • How Content Design became part of the overall Product Design process.
  • How we, at Mirakl, re-shaped our whole product content process around Figma as a single source of truth for all teams (Product, Design, Writers, Tech).
  • How we organized our Figma project and how we use the tool on a daily basis
  • How we onboarded the Product Content team within Figma and make them work hand in hand with Product Designer to constantly improve product content quality overall.
